author: SanghyunKo
body:
Updated generator DQM histogram code to include scale & PDF information.

Currently, generator DQM provides little information on scale & PDFs, and the only variable included in DQM histogram from HepMC::PdfInfo is Bjorken x. This update makes DQM histograms to provide scale & PDF information so that validators can check this information for release validation & generator validation. Relevant talk in PH Generator meeting to this proposal can be found at [1].

Tested on CMSSW_10_2_X_2018-06-15-1100.

[1] [https://indico.cern.ch/event/725198/contributions/3026963/attachments/1661134/2661397/180604_shKo.pdf](https://indico.cern.ch/event/725198/contributions/3026963/attachments/1661134/2661397/180604_shKo.pdf)
title: Add scale & PDF information to the DQM histograms
